vote.motion-ch: 本委員會同意處理委員根據《財務委員會會議程序》第37A段擬動議的議案
vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 37A of the Finance Committee Procedure

vote.motion-ch: 動議其後就相同議程項目下任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後進行點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion that in the event of further divisions being claimed of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2018-19)11 - PWSC(2017-18)30 工務小組委員會在2018年3月28日所提出的建議 – 拆卸銅鑼灣加路連山道用地的現有上蓋建築物
vote.motion-en: FCR(2018-19)11 - PWSC(2017-18)30 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 28 MARCH 2018 – The demolition of existing superstructures at Caroline Hill Road site, Causeway Bay

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2018-19)14 – PWSC(2018-19)4 工務小組委員會在2018年4月25日所提出的建議 – 瑪麗醫院第一期重建計劃、在啟德發展區興建新急症醫院、廣華醫院重建計劃、聖母醫院重建計劃及葛量洪醫院重建計劃第一期
vote.motion-en: FCR(2018-19)14 – PWSC(2018-19)4 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 25 APRIL 2018 – Redevelopment of Queen Mary Hospital, phase 1, New acute hospital at Kai Tak Development Area, Redevelopment of Kwong Wah Hospital, Redevelopment of Our Lady of Maryknoll Hospital and Redevelopment of Grantham Hospital, phase 1

vote.motion-ch: FCR(2018-19)12 – PWSC(2017-18)34 工務小組委員會在2018年4月11日所提出的建議 – 落馬洲河套地區發展－土地除污及前期工程及第一期主體工程
vote.motion-en: FCR(2018-19)12 – PWSC(2017-18)34 RECOMMENDATION OF THE PUBLIC WORKS SUBCOMMITTEE MADE ON 11 APRIL 2018 – Development of Lok Ma Chau Loop – land decontamination and advance engineering works and Main Works Package 1
